Reviews.Content: Wonderful place This place is great. Friendly, close to convention center , Warehouse district and the French Quarter. Lots of great places to eat within a couple blocks. Rooms are clean, front desk area is friendly and helpful. We could not have asked for more. And we almost didn't stay here because of bad review on Trip Advisor site...but my agent assured me this was a good place and she was right! We will definitely stay here again.
Reviews.Author: linemax

Reviews.Content: Beautiful Stay Wonderful resort in a great location. It is a converted old firehouse and beautifully done while preserving a quaint New Orleans feel. It is a few blocks from most everything you want to do in town.The rooms are large and feature high ceilings, full kitchens, and some with hot tubs on balconey.The service was excellent and acommidations clean and comfortable. Parking is close but not onsite.
Reviews.Author: sirkle
